body: Good shit.
This sht is underrated
beautiful!
a growing up character (from childhood to adult) shouldn't be included as age progression, smh nhentai and their shitty admin

Well, looks like it's been quite some time (over 2 years) that we haven't heard anything about a sequel. From what I've checked on their Twitter, artist certainly hasn't forgotten this series so there is still hope that we might get a sequel some day... after all, we got some sort of plan that this series would be 4 parts thou :)
Dark skin with long white hair and a kuudere also,  holy shit she hit all my weak points. 10/10 waifu material
So there are 4 series, and where?the others ?

"the purpose is not to satisfy anyones libido"

boy did the author fail there... I cant say I find the story anything except plain, 5/10.  The art and hentai though? 10/10

also he says this is not NTR, so that means either the boy is a reincarnation(this being a prequel) or the girl in each one is not the same girl, like some kind of mystical clone, in both stories the shrine maiden mentioned getting pregnant, so maybe every shrine maiden gives birth to an identical girl to continue the duty
My NTR sense is tingling and I DONT FCKNG LIKE IT. Wholesome sequel please.
Where're the other parts?

Hope we get more eventually.
<3

Cant wait for 3 and 4 this is soo good and wholesome plus shes just gorgeous not even reading it for the dojuin again am actually enjoying the story
